Direct message the job poster from Storm5
Alan Moran
Connecting the best DevOps & Engineering talent with innovative RetailTechs worldwide | Storm5
⚡ Director VP of Data Science💸 $200,000 - $300,000 base + Equity (Location and experience depending)🌎 Hybrid USMy client is transforming the $800 billion trucking industry by empowering meaningful logistics relationships through their award-winning Freight Procurement Platform.They are evolving the procurement process by offering solutions that enable shippers and carriers to make more empowered, strategic decisions that are backed by real-time connectivity and AI-driven decision-making.ResponsibilitiesGrow and lead the entire data orgCollaborate with the leadership team and work with advisors and stakeholdersDefining the roadmap and direction of the companies data productsRecruiting and retentionRequirements6+ years experience in data science leadership including managing remote teamsExperience working within a high growth start upAbility to align a high-performing technical team with organizational goalsStrategic leader who can manage future expectations while maintaining and executing current goalsBackground in logistics is a bonus but not required📧 Interested in applying? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button⚡ Storm5 is a Retail Tech recruitment firm with clients across North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website www.storm5.com and follow the Storm5 Linked In page for the latest jobs and intel
